title: The Everything Music Collection
description: All the music you'll need to finish that game you're working on! 108 LOOPABLE TRACKS and over 3 HOURS of music, this music pack has it all for one affordable price.
longDescription:
🎧 LISTEN TO THE SAMPLERS FOR EACH GENRE HERE.

📺 LISTEN TO THE FULL MUSIC PACK HERE.


All tracks in this music pack are STREAMING AND YOUTUBE SAFE - no need to worry about copyright strikes! :)


Containing 108 LOOPABLE TRACKS and totaling over 3 HOURS of music, this music pack has it all for one affordable price. Inside the music pack, tracks are broken down into genres to easily find the exact style and mood you're looking for.


Not only do you get loops, but you also get the STEMS for two of the genres (95 in total), allowing you to create ADAPTIVE and INTERACTIVE music.


The EVERYTHING Music Collection is a bundle of the following music packs (which can be purchased individually):

  • Orchestral Fantasy
  • 16-Bit Adventures
  • All Things Piano
  • Casual Contemporary
  • Atmospheric Music


It also includes these two bonus music packs:

  • Hybrid Sci-Fi Music
  • Retro Video Game Music

technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 108 looapble original high-quality WAV tracks (44.1 kHz / 16-bit)
  • 95 stems for layers of adaptive and interactive music
  • Over 3 hours of music
  • YouTube-Safe music tracks
  • Unlimited Royalty-Free License

Number of Audio Wavs: 203

Number of Audio Cues: 203

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz / 16-bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 322 minutes

Supported Engine Versions: 4.0 and later

Supported Development Platforms: Android, Gear VR, HoloLens 2, HTML5, iOS, Linux, MacOS, Nintendo Switch, Oculus, PlayStation 4, Steam VR, Windows 32-bit, Windows 64-bit, Xbox One
